name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 HD
description:
Sonic the Hedgehog 2 HD is an arcade game developed by Team S2HD. It came out on 01-03-2012. Team S2HD published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Sonic the Hedgehog 2 HD on PC.
It was produced by Shinobu Toyoda. It was directed by Hirokazu Yasuhara and Masaharu Yoshii. It was scored by Masato Nakamura.
